data.actual_result: It shows the toast notification with "1 message since January 1st 2015"
data.expected_result: Either no toast notification, or "1 message since current date"
data.short_description: Sending a message in a new DM session shows a toast notification with "1 message since January 1st 2015"
data.steps_to_repro: - Start a new DM with someone who you've never talked with - Send a message to them
